name: Streams
short: Enhanced stream notifications with platform-specific role mentions.
description: Get notifications for Twitch, YouTube, and Picarto streams. Enhanced version with platform-specific role mentions allowing different roles to be mentioned for each platform.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
You've just installed the Streams cog!
Type `[p]help streamset` to configure stream alerts, and `[p]help streamalert` to manage stream notifications.
